original: Karlbrink, Gillis Emanuel Sandy, advokat, Göteborg, f. 1/3/05 i V. Sal-lerup, Malmöh. 1. G. 35 m. tandl. Doris Rödén. Barn: Doris Gisiela f. 47. — Stud:ex. i Landskrona 23, jur. kand. i Lund 29. Tinigstjg. i Östra härads o. Gotl. n. doims. 29-32:, tjg. i Svea hovr. o. just: re v. 33, tf. borgmäsit. i Sala s. å., bitr. jurist å Gustaf Fitgers Adv:-byriå i Gbg 33’-36, egen adv :verks’amh. i Gbg sed. 35. Led. av Sv:e’s adv:samf. sed. 40.
translated: Karlbrink, Gillis Emanuel Sandy, lawyer, Gothenburg, born on March 1, 1905 in V. Sallerup, Malmöhus County. First marriage in 1935 with dentist Doris Rödén. Children: Doris Gisiela, born in 1947. Completed high school in Landskrona in 1923, received a law degree in Lund in 1929. Started his legal career as a trainee judge in the Eastern District Court and Gotland's District Court from 1929 to 1932, served as a clerk in the Svea Court of Appeal and the Royal Court of Justice in 1933. Temporary city magistrate in Sala in the same year. Assistant lawyer at Gustaf Fitger's Law Firm in Gothenburg from 1933 to 1936, established his own law firm in Gothenburg from 1935. Became a member of the Swedish Lawyers' Association in 1940.

workExperience.description: Established own law firm in Gothenburg
